metadata.description: AI coding agent toolkit - browser superpowers, code intelligence, and development tools

plugins.name: agnt
plugins.description: Browser superpowers for AI coding agents: process management, reverse proxy with traffic logging, frontend instrumentation with 50+ diagnostic functions, sketch mode for wireframing, and design mode for UI iteration

plugins.name: lci
plugins.description: Lightning Code Index - sub-millisecond semantic code search and code intelligence for AI agents. Provides instant codebase navigation, symbol lookup, and call hierarchy analysis

plugins.name: tools
plugins.description: Complete Standard Beagle toolkit - combines agnt (browser superpowers) and lci (code intelligence) for the ultimate AI coding experience

plugins.name: mcp-architect
plugins.description: Design high-quality MCP servers with progressive discovery, context compression, and token-efficient responses. Includes patterns for multi-tool MCPs, the info tool pattern, cross-tool IDs, and automation-friendly JSON formats.

plugins.name: ux-design
plugins.description: UX design principles, color theory, typography systems, component library design, and usability heuristics. Comprehensive design guidance for creating exceptional user experiences with Adobe Color-inspired palette creation, type system design, and accessibility-first thinking.

plugins.name: ux-developer
plugins.description: UX-driven development toolkit for building accessible, user-centered websites and applications. Integrates UX principles, accessibility verification (WCAG 2.2), Nielsen's heuristics, and usability best practices directly into the development workflow. Includes agents for comprehensive audits and component design.

plugins.name: dartai
plugins.description: Dart task management with adversarial cooperation loops - automated task execution through quality, test, security, and refactoring verification pipelines. Features dartboard memory for project defaults, plan adjustment at each phase, and context-sized tasks with verifiable outcomes.

plugins.name: mcp-tester
plugins.description: MCP server testing and debugging toolkit powered by mcp-debug. Dynamic server management, traffic analysis with circular buffer, schema validation, hot-swap development workflows, and protocol debugging.

plugins.name: slop-mcp
plugins.description: SLOP (Simple Language Open Protocol) integration for MCP management. Migrate existing MCP setups, search and execute tools, manage resources, and orchestrate multiple MCP servers. Includes Dart MCP tool reference skills for reduced get_metadata calls.

plugins.name: slop-coder
plugins.description: SLOP language coding assistant - teaches LLMs how to write SLOP code with comprehensive language reference, patterns, built-in functions, and module system documentation for building AI agents and orchestration workflows.

plugins.name: prompt-engineer
plugins.description: State-of-the-art prompt and context engineering toolkit for 2026. Includes DSPy-inspired optimization, Claude 4.x patterns, context engineering, chain-of-thought design, RAG prompting, multi-agent orchestration, and model-specific guidelines for GPT, DeepSeek, Qwen, Grok, Kimi K2, and more.

plugins.name: figma-query
plugins.description: Token-efficient Figma integration with query-based data shaping, image export, design tokens, and adversarial design library extraction. Build production-ready component libraries with exact CSS, assets, HTML mockups, and comprehensive documentation using the Ralph Wiggum quality loop.

plugins.name: workflow
plugins.description: General-purpose adversarial workflow automation with Ralph Wiggum loops. Context-aware task execution with clean subagent isolation, multi-stage verification, hook-based iteration tracking, and intelligent memory preservation before context compaction. Automatically suggests memories for patterns, decisions, lessons, and process improvements. Inspired by Goose Ralph loops and g3 principles.
